mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.perms FROM sys_user_role AS ur LEFT JOIN sys_role AS r ON ur.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu AS rm ON r.id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu AS m ON rm.menu_id = m.id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userid} AND r.`status` = 0 AND m.`status` = 0 AND m.`menu_type` IN ("C","F")
SELECT perms FROM `sys_menu` WHERE menu_type IN ("C", "F")
